metadata.title: CVE-2017-9104 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in adns before 1.5.2. It hangs, eating CPU, if a compression pointer loop is encountered.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-9104` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

adns-tools - 1.6.0-2
libadns1 - 1.6.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: adns package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.0-2').
